title: AdminUI Spacing Issue
description:
In the new AdminUI I am seeing an issue with the second line of the status output.  There seems to be a missing spaces.

Example:
Requests: 1, Fetched: 16,825421/s, Skipped: 0, Processed: 16,825421/s

Should the output be:
Requests: 1, Fetched: 16,825 421/s, Skipped: 0, Processed: 16,825 421/s

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
Firstly, thanks for the report!

Does this patch fix it?

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: Oh, and for the record, this is within the dataimport tab.

comments.author: AJ Lemke
comments.content: The patch does fix the issue.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1712855 from Upayavira in branch 'dev/trunk'

SOLR-8243 Fix spacing in dataimport tab in UI
